WorkItem.ClosedComment:
With 0.9.5 we added an indicator in the statusbar in the bottom left, which tells you when compile on save is completed.

Sounds like this is something Resharper can add cheaply for TypeScript.
WorkItem.Description:
Resharper has this little indicator above the scrollbar that shows the status of the interactive analysis

Typescript has this nice feature to compile files on the fly in the VS IDE, but I find it hard to see when this complication is done.

Adding an indicator like Resharper (maybe just in a Typescript toolbar) would be very helpful?
